nodes.text: Coronet Zoo was a zoo in Coronet City on the planet Corellia. It was struck by a stray rocket sometime during the Battle of Corellia, and many of the zoo's creatures were freed, allowing them to prey on both civilians and other zoo animals.

The numerous jaggalors of the zoo that escaped from its enclosures were domesticated by the Republic, however, and were unleashed upon the soldiers of the reconstituted Sith Empire during their battle on Corellia. A jaggalor was tended to by either one or two Republic feeders.
Coronet Zoo contained at least one acklay, three nexu, and several jaggalors.
